bibl.title: Two Amulets in the Getty Museum: A Gold Amulet for Aurelia's Epilepsy. An Inscribed Magical Stone for Fever, "Chills", and Headache.
bibl.note: Inv. 80 AI 53. Gold amulet. 3rd cent. A.D. - Inv. 73 AI 1. Magical stone. Prob. 3rd cent. A.D.
bibl.seg: Kotansky Roy, Two Amulets in the Getty Museum: A Gold Amulet for Aurelia's Epilepsy. An Inscribed Magical Stone for Fever, "Chills", and Headache.
143.4 T. Getty Museum Inv. 73 AI 1; 80 AI 53
